name: Lobstor
description: THIS FILE WILL BE REPLACED BY bit.ly/lobstor2
tutorial: This file will be phased out and replaced by bit.ly/lobstor2

packages.description: The full lobstor dinner!  Gorge yourself on our full provider file with over 20 sources. If you like this consider buying a coffee www.buymeacoffee.com/synclerlobstor. Use this package on its own.
A little amuse-bouche of our top 6 most popular providers. Great if you are in a hurry and just need a snack! Use this package on its own.
Asian inspired twist on our full dinner package.  Querying Anime content from all your favorites PLUS additional Anime content from specialist sources. Use this package on its own.

Classic French.  A generous serving of our full dinner package filtered for French language titles with a garnish of specific French sources on top.  Use this package on its own - NOTE: French filtering is not yet a feature of Syncler but when it is this file is configured to support this future enhancement.
On the side a single portion of Pirate Bay.  Enjoy this on its own or mix it with other side dishes.
On the side a single portion of Magnet DL.  Scoff this on its own or mix it with other side dishes.
